[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 11111111_01111111_11111111_11111111 is converted into TFP   111_11111011_11111111
    FLOAT 11111111_01111111_11111111_11111111 is converted into TFP   111_11111011_11111111
    TFP   111_11111011_11111111 is converted into FLOAT 11111111_01111111_11100000_00000000
    TFP   111_11111011_11111111 is converted into FLOAT 11111111_01111111_11100000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    111_11111011_11111111 + 111_11111011_11111111 = 111_11111100_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    111_11111011_11111111 * 111_11111011_11111111 = 011_11111100_00000000
